questions.question: He………… her two years before we met.
options: married		B. had married		C. had been married	D. has married

questions.question: Mr. McGuinness is from Ireland, …...........?
options: isn't he		B. is he			C. does he			D. doesn't he

questions.question: Ted's flight from Amsterdam took more than 11 hours. He ….. be exhausted after such a long flight.
options: could		B. should			C. can				D. must

questions.question: With the cost of airfare so high, in-flight meals …... be free.
options: need		B. have to			C. ought to			D. might

questions.question: The students enjoy …........ by such an exciting new teacher.
options: being taught 		B. be taught 		C. to be taught 	D. to been taught

questions.question: The entire valley can ……… from their mountain home.
options: be seeing			B. to be seen		C. being seen 	D. be seen

questions.question: In parts of Anatolia, many different fruits are still dried ........... many people in the sun for consumption during winter.
options: with  		B. by  		C. of  			D. about

questions.question: My phone ran out of …........., so I plugged it in to charge.
options: satnav			B. microchips		C. usb stick		D. battery

questions.question: Knowing how to communicate …...... others is a necessary skill for future success.
options: to				B. on				C. with		D. of

questions.question: Peter is …........ the job of a navy officer because he is brave and well disciplined.
options: cut out for		B. take up			C. take to		D. find out
